member.name: T:ExplorerNavigationButton.ExplorerNavigationButton
member.summary: A button with the appearance of the explorer's navigation buttons.
member.remarks: The control switches its appearance based on the current operating system to fit the explorer's appearance.

member.name: M:ExplorerNavigationButton.ExplorerNavigationButton.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new ExplorerNavigationButton.

member.name: E:ExplorerNavigationButton.ExplorerNavigationButton.ArrowDirectionChanged
member.summary: Is risen if the arrow direction has changed.

member.name: E:ExplorerNavigationButton.ExplorerNavigationButton.ThemeChanged
member.summary: Is risen if the theme has changed.

member.summary: Indicates the direction of the arrow.

member.name: P:ExplorerNavigationButton.ExplorerNavigationButton.Theme
member.summary: Indicates the theme of this button.

member.name: T:ExplorerNavigationButton.ArrowDirection
member.summary: The direction of an arrow.

member.name: F:ExplorerNavigationButton.ArrowDirection.Left
member.summary: The arrow points to the left.

member.name: F:ExplorerNavigationButton.ArrowDirection.Right
member.summary: The arrow points to the right.

member.summary: The theme of the ExplorerNavigationButton.

member.summary: The aero theme.

member.summary: The metro theme.

member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.
